name: cassandrakazenzakis
text: the barcode language and PTOO are fantastic

name: bron
text: A comment left by bron was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Gold7600, mortshire, Anniqu3, miaou)

name: anathan
text: Don't rag on the french fry's dreams, man. That ain't cool.

name: chaesar
text: I dunno, I would imagine the extent of a french fry's dreams to be salt, ketchup and maybe mayonnaise, depending on geography.

name: twohundredninety
text: What a happy coincidence! As far as French fries go, those are pretty much my dreams, too.

name: wazza
text: what about cheese curds and gravy, dogg?

name: mortshire
text: that french fry is gary cooper as longfellow deeds.

name: orvel
text: super duper.

name: crinklebat
text: "you sure have a lot of dreams for a french fry!" is just so cute. Aw, Philippe.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, saddestking, Overmedicated, orvel, aHatOfPig, ravindra108, blarghamagarky)

name: dans
text: "You sure have a lot of dreams for a filthy frigger!"

name: aurorasbored
text: Was I the only one that thought Fry was gonna make a dive? To end this starchy life? Maybe I'm an awful person.

name: saint
text: i thought the same thing. I'm as bad as you.

name: woodenteeth
text: I kinda thought the same thing, then immediately realised it's because the PTOO looks like a graphic-jump-arc representation. Brain probably picked it up and decided what was happening before you consciously registered it.

name: patkun
text: Come to think of it, Philippe isn't really built for climbing trees either...

name: tekende
text: The young otter smiles as he concedes that it is kind of scary being up that high.

name: coco
text: I don't think Philippe's mother would approve of this situation; hanging around in trees with french fries who spit is not something for special boys to do!

name: saddestking
text: Philippe's shoe size is "exactly one french fry long"

name: hamscout
text:
French Fry measurement is the "five apples high" for the junk food generation!

It's Acne Smurf!

name: phthano
text: It's all about scale. I mean, to a French Fry, this is being on top of the snacky world.

name: kikineko
text: Dang, why can't my french fry speak bar code and spit?

name: kikineko
text: Dang, why can't my french fry speak bar code and spit?

name: afternine
text: I'm not going to spend a lot of time on this comment.
